sentences.en: A PDA is a type of congenital heart defect.
sentences.cn: 开放性动脉导管(PDA)是先天性心脏病的一种类型.

sentences.en: A typical PDA can function as a mobile phone, fax sender, and personal organizer.
sentences.cn: 典型的掌上电脑具有移动电话、传真发送机和个人文件夹的功能。

sentences.en: Absolutely available PDA camera procedure call. And can save your settings directory.
sentences.cn: 绝对可用的PDA摄像头 调用程序. 并可以任意设置保存目录.

sentences.en: I really need a PDA. It can keep me organized.
sentences.cn: 我真的需要一台PDA, 那会让我做事很有条理.

sentences.en: In fact, the PDA idea also failed to catch on with potential customers.
sentences.cn: 事实上, PDA的想法也未能迎合潜在客户.

sentences.en: Jobs believed that combining a cell phone with the core functions of a PDA, however, would result in a truly useful device.
sentences.cn: 乔布斯相信，如果将一部手机和一部 PDA 的核心功能相结合，则能产生一部真正有用的设备。

sentences.en: Now I can just get it from my PDA.
sentences.cn: 现在我能从PDA中 得到需要的信息.

sentences.en: PDA ( personal digital assistant ) can send email, download information and play music.
sentences.cn: PDA ( 个人数字助理 ) 能够收发邮件及下载资料和播放音乐.

sentences.en: Printers and hand - held personal digital assistant ( PDA ) devices.
sentences.cn: 打印机和手持式个人数字助理 ( PDA ) 设备.

sentences.en: Sell PDA leather case and mobile case for LADY fashion design!
sentences.cn: PDA的销售情况和流动情况,为皮革女时装设计!

sentences.en: Smart phones, PDA phones, map server through GPRS connection.
sentences.cn: 智能手机, PDA手机, 可通过GPRS连接地图服务器.

sentences.en: The success of PDA system riches some experience for embedded system application development later.
sentences.cn: 本PDA系统的开发成功,为以后嵌入式系统应用开发积累了丰富的经验.

sentences.en: Thethe importance the motion service based on PDA in the power - line patrolling.
sentences.cn: 介绍PDA移动 服务在电力巡线中的必要性,提出基于PDA的 电力巡线数据采集系统的设计与实现方案,最后总结了系统特点.

sentences.en: We'll target the PDA consumer market.
sentences.cn: 我们将目标锁定PDA消费市场.

sentences.en: Will we get our daily news via the PDA?
sentences.cn: 现在我们得到消息,透过PDA的每天?

sentences.en: With cotton lining, the inside offers cell phone and PDA pockets.
sentences.cn: 与棉面料, 里面提供了手机和PDA的口袋.

trans.tran_cn: Personal Digital Assistant 掌上电脑
(personal digital assistant)掌上电脑；个人数码助理
trans.tran_en: a very small light computer that you can carry with you, and that you use to store information such as telephone numbers, addresses, and  appointment s  . Some PDAs can send and receive email, and connect to the Internet.
